name: Tower Defense: Magic Quest
description:
Evil never sleeps, so be ready to protect magic land in the epic Magic Quest: Tower Defense!

Hordes of evil creatures are invading the kingdom of mighty spells. Gather a team of heroes - elven archers, dwarven gunners, shamans and wizards of men - all of them are pillars of courage in the world of witchcraft and magic.
Together they will rebut all enemy's attacks and cancel the pathway to the heart of the reign. Moreover, in Magic Quest: Tower Defense you will be able to improve skills of witchcraft of your men, making them more effective against intruders.
The army of invaders is numerous: goblins, orks, ogrs, bandits and spiders of all sorts are getting together to wipe out your kingdom of light.
Have a courage to stop the feast of darkness in the magic castle defense game.

Find the best tower defense startegy to successfully сonfront your enemies in various locations - valleys, that once used to be peaceful, dwarven mines, full of hidden treasures, mountains, deserts, ocean's coast and islands, floating far in the skies.
All this marvellous places will serve as the scenery for your epic adventure.

Magic Quest: Tower Defense

A unique tower defense with outstanding units

- Epic magic battles
- Lots of magical creatures: goblins, orks and many others
- 6 unique territories to defend allow you to have the full battle experience
- 20 levels
- 4 upgradable towers

Discover all secrets of this beautiful and extreme tower defence game!

Your feedback is greatly appreciated!
